  2. Ukrainian soldier's M1 MacBook Air takes direct shrapnel hit, saving his life — screen cracked and letter 'K' missing but laptop remains functional  Tom's Hardware
  3. MacBook Air Survives Ukraine War Zones: What It Means  Gadget Hacks
  4. Ukrainian Soldier Shows MacBook Air That Stopped Shell Shrapnel  The Mac Observer
  5. M1-equipped MacBook Air continues to work after being hit by shrapnel  GIGAZINE

item.title: Welcome to the Future of Noise Canceling - wired.com
item.description: Welcome to the Future of Noise Canceling  wired.com
